headline: Is There Now an Opportunity in Synopsys After Latest Stock Slide?
summary: If you have Synopsys stock on your watchlist or already in your portfolio, there’s a good chance the latest price swings have caught your attention. In just the past week, shares gave up 6.4%, even as the 30-day chart still reflects a robust 13.2% rebound. Over the past year, Synopsys is down 18.7%, but zooming out to three and five years shows those who held their nerve were rewarded with gains of 58.1% and 93.8% respectively. Clearly, there’s a lot riding on how much faith investors have in...
